summary: Analytical and detail-oriented Computer Science Engineering student with strong expertise in Python, SQL, and data visualization. Skilled in transforming raw data into actionable insights through Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA), Feature Engineering, and interactive dashboards. Experienced in building end-to-end data solutions with measurable business impact. Seeking a Data Analyst position to apply technical and analytical skills to solve real-world problems.

achievements: Designed and deployed 5+ interactive dashboards in Power BI
Enhanced data modeling and report-building efficiency by 20%
Created dynamic visualizations for executive decision-making
Automated repetitive data handling tasks using Python
Developed data processing scripts for large datasets

projects.title: Multiple Disease Prediction System
projects.description: Flask web app integrating multiple ML models to predict diabetes, heart disease, and Parkinson's disease with 85% accuracy.
highlights: Integrated 3 ML models for disease prediction
Built responsive web interface with Bootstrap

projects.title: Zepto Sales Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: Analyzed 10k+ sales records; found low-fat products contributed 77.6% of sales.

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
education.institution: Siddhartha Institute of Technology and Sciences
